#Text=Uncle , do you realize what this means ?!

#Text= Iroh says : " I wo n't get to finish my game ?

column1: #Text=" Zuko says : " It means my search is about to come to an end .
#Text=" Zuko says : " That light came from an incredibly powerful source !
#Text=It has to be him !
#Text=" Iroh says : " Or it 's just the celestial lights .
#Text=We 've been down this road before , Prince Zuko .
#Text=I do n't want you to get too excited over nothing .
#Text=Please , sit .
#Text=Why do n't you enjoy a cup of calming Jasmine tea ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " I do n't need any calming tea !
#Text=I need to capture the Avatar !
#Text=Helmsman , head a course for the light !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Stop !
#Text=" Katara says : " Stop it !
#Text=" Aang says : " I need to ask you something ... " Katara says : " What ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Please ... come closer .
#Text=" Katara says : " What is it ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Will you go penguin sledding with me ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Uh , sure ... I - I guess .
#Text=" Aang says : " What 's going on here ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " You tell us !
#Text=How did you get in the ice ?
#Text=And why are n't you frozen ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm not sure .
#Text=" Aang says : " Appa !
#Text=Are you all right ?
#Text=Wake up , buddy .
#Text=" Aang says : " Ha , ha !
#Text=You 're okay !
#Text=" Sokka says : " What is that thing ?
#Text=" Aang says : " This is Appa , my flying bison .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Right , and this is Katara , my flying sister .
#Text=" Aang says : " Do n't worry , it 'll wash out .
#Text=So do you guys live around here ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Do n't answer that !
#Text=Did you see that crazy bolt of light ?!
#Text=He was probably trying to signal the Fire Navy !
#Text=" Katara says : " Oh yeah , I 'm sure he 's a spy for the Fire Navy .
#Text=You can tell by that evil look in his eye .
#Text=The paranoid one is my brother , Sokka .
#Text=You never told us your name .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm A ... a-a-a-Achoo !
#Text=I 'm Aang .
#Text=" Sokka says : " You just sneezed ... and flew ten feet in the air !
#Text=" Aang says : " Really ?
#Text=It felt higher than that .
#Text=" Katara says : " You 're an airbender !
#Text=" Aang says : " Sure am !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Giant light beams , flying bison , airbenders ... I think I got midnight sun madness .
#Text=I 'm going home to where stuff makes sense .
#Text=" Aang says : " Well , if you guys are stuck , Appa and I can give you a lift .
#Text=" Katara says : " We 'd love a ride !
#Text=Thanks !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Oh no !
#Text=I 'm not getting on that fluffy snot monster !
#Text=" Katara says : " Are you hoping some other kind of monster will come along and give you a ride home ?
#Text=You know , before you freeze to death ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Okay , first time flyers , hold on tight !
#Text=Appa , yip - yip !
#Text=" Aang says : " Come on , Appa .
#Text=Yip - yip !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Wow , that was truly amazing ... " Aang says : " Appa 's just a little tired .
#Text=A little rest and he 'll be soaring through the sky .
#Text=You 'll see .
#Text=" Katara says : " Why are you smiling at me like that ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Oh , I was smiling ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " I 'm going to bed now .
#Text=Yep , a man needs his rest .
#Text=Prince Zuko , you need some sleep .
#Text=Even if you 're right , and the Avatar is alive , you wo n't find him .
#Text=Your father , grandfather and great - grandfather all tried and failed .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Because their honor did n't hinge on the Avatar 's capture .
#Text=Mine does .
#Text=This coward 's hundred years in hiding are over .
#Text="
